content:
bob Bajek   Staff ReporterNovember  

Eastern   Ohio Valley Conference continued its sevenmatch losing streak this weekend by losing to Southeast Missouri and Southern Illinois Edwardsville this weekend PERIOD It is the Panthers secondlongest losing streak of the season PERIOD



Southern Illinois Edwardsville  swept Eastern    Saturday at Edwardsville in the first regular season meeting between the two programs PERIOD The Cougars have won four out of their last five matches PERIOD

SIUE senior setter Mallory Clements led the Cougars with  assists seven kills and three aces PERIOD

The Cougars had a . hitting percentage and  kills opposed to Easterns . hitting percentage and  kills PERIOD Sophomore outside hitter Alex Zwettler had  kills and was the only Eastern player to reach double digits PERIOD

Eastern committed  errors and were outblocked  PERIOD

The match against the Cougars did not count as an OVC match because SIUE will not be a full member until  PERIOD The Cougars are  against OVC competition this year PERIOD

SEMO   OVC downed the Panthers in three sets    Friday in Cape Girardeau Mo PERIOD

The Redbirds had  kills to Easterns  PERIOD SEMO sophomore outside hitter Claire Keaton and senior outside hitter Aubrey Dondlinger had  and  kills respectively PERIOD Eastern freshman middle blocker Melanie Boykins had a teamhigh nine kills PERIOD

SEMO led in passing  assists digs  and aces  PERIOD

With the Panthers longest road stretch of the season over they will return to action against OVC rival Jacksonville State at  p.m PERIOD Friday at Lantz Arena PERIOD

Bob Bajek can be reached at  or at emailprotected PERIOD
